Gangon follows BrightBlade...whatever Hell Beast wants he gives.....even if
it was an arm or leg, probably......anyway, he liked BrightBlade, he had
never liked anyone before..but as soon as she called him on the commlink, he
was hooked! nobody EVER did that to him before, Hell Beast was the only one
to ever give him a commlink call...even back on Cybertron!......he
followed.... eager to blast a Maximal or one of Megatron's Predacons!.....
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 19, 2000 11:57 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> BrightBlade,Rage
>
> * BrightBlade kept her hand on Gangon's arm as she walked out of the base,
> Megatron was out there somewhere and she was going to find him!*
>
> " Come on, we may not have much time before he holes up somewhere and
cloaks
> his energy signature!"
>
> * She knew the main direction in which Megatron and his stowaways went
while
> she had made com contact with Gangon about his offer. He wouldn't get away
> from her!*
>
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
>
> *Rage snarled, since she had washed her mouth out she could still taste
the
> raptor's strange blood in the cracks between her teeth!
> She walked on through the trees as the sun rose to her left, she was still
> hungry and she even considered going after the raptor's again...despite
the
> taste.
> She was that hungry!!!
> A sudden smell of coldness came to her snout as she continued to amble on,
> it seemed familiar but the lack of logic in her mind prevented her from
> remembering.                                     It was the nasty reality
of
> a Beast Mode made dominant!
> Rage soon came to the edge of the forest and looked out into the distance,
> her mouth watered at the site of a herd of grazing antilope in a field or
> rolling grain.
> She was about to begin to stalk the herbavors when a larger object came
into
> view beyond them, a large metal structure.(The Ark!)
> A sudden flash of a forgotten image occurred behind her eyes, some scene
of
> metal beings but it was gone to soon to identify it.
> Rage sniffed the air, the coldness she had smelled before was close.
> She snarled, the rumble in her tummy was still louder!*
>
>
